ProductInfo.Features:
DIY installation & very easy for operation, USB2.0 to computer or AV out to TV/monitor, Uses your computer as a DVR
Remote Internet surveillance, Motion Detection, Cell Phone Access, Scheduled Recording, Audio supported
Weatherproof Design, Night vision (Effective range: 10-15M), 10 MB of Hard Disk space (Minimum 1.0 GB hard disk space recommended for recording), 64MB Ram (most computers)
Around 330 feet (100 meters) Transmission range without block, Running at 466 MHZ (most computers), Intel or AMD processor
Minimum system requirements:Windows 98/Me/2000/XP/Vista 32bit/windows 7 32bit; Can't work on MAC Computers and Windows 64Bit OS
ProductInfo.Name: 2.4Ghz Wireless 4 Infrared Camera Kit Home Security CCTV with USB DVR Surveillance System
